humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that 3 sentinel lymph nodes were assessed and all were found to be free of tumor (0/1, 0/1, 0/1). This information aligns with New Rule 11, which states that N0 can indicate that all assessed lymph nodes are negative for metastatic carcinoma. Therefore, the N stage for this patient's cancer is N0.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report indicates that three sentinel lymph nodes (right axillary sentinel #1, #2, and #3) were biopsied and found to be free of tumor (0/1 for each node). This means that there is no evidence of cancer in the lymph nodes. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
